attributes.action: remove control of City of Derry Airport from Derry City Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: City of Derry airport runs at an enormous loss to the local taxpayers. Millions each year are spent to keep it running under the control of the local council. Tax payers should not have to to foot the bill so that Ryanair can have increased profits. This is OUR money and should be better spent on local services. Derry City council have proved that this airport can only be run at a loss. Either it should be removed from their control or it should be closed.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
